name: City Animals
description: Forest animals run wild in the city! Get points by feeding apples to the animals, but must avoid the obstacles on your way. If you collide with an obstacle or animal you'll lose 1 life, get extra lifes by colliding with the potions. If you lose 1 life with 0 extra lifes, is game over. Move your avatar with the horizontal arrows, use the space key to jump over, feed the animals with the up arrow key, and destroy the rocks with the down arrow key but the bombs won't work on fences. Be carefull not to throw bombs to animals!  Get great score and beat the previous best player!
